author: M
title: PDL Division Football Rescheduled Matches
text:
October 21, 2015 | 0 Comments 
The Bermuda Football Association announced changes to some upcoming PDL Division football matches. 
The PDL match scheduled for Wednesday December 2nd between SCC and NVCC will be played Wednesday – October 28th: 
The PDL match scheduled for Friday – December 4th between Dandy Town and St Davids will be played Thursday – October 29th: 
The PDL match between HPWC / PHC scheduled for Saturday – December 5th will be played on Friday – October 30th: 
The PDL match between BLVD / BAA scheduled for Saturday – December 5th will be played on Saturday – October 31st. Related Stories
